short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UI Replicator is a Chrome extension that allows you to replicate the UI of any website by downloading their HTML and CSS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clone any frontend with only one click.

Install the extension.

Go on the website you want to clone.

Click on the extension.

In between 10-30 seconds you will get a .zip file with the HTML, CSS and JS.

Work on Webflow, Wordpress, Bubble, and many more.
